title: Roadmap is video for how to play league

embed.description: Download League of Legends now and join the tens of millions already competing.

body:
This is the page it takes you to when you click the article about champion road map.

And for all things that doesnt work, this is painful to me, cause I was looking forward to it.

Could you please fix this? Thanks!

replies.body:
How to play League...

Do not pick APs xD
Responded in another thread, but shared the broken link and its being worked on now. Apologies about that!
